General.Name: Fusion Fuel Green PLC
General.Description: Fusion Fuel Green PLC focuses on the production of hydrogen in Portugal, Spain, and Morocco. The company intends to provide hydrogen generators to clients that operate their green hydrogen plants. It serves natural gas networks and grids, ammonia producers, oil refineries, regulators, and related government departments. The company was founded in 2018 and is based in Dublin, Ireland.
General.Address: 10 Earlsfort Terrace, Dublin, Ireland, D02 T380
